answers.content_html: It reduces the input force and the output force.
answers.feedback_html: It is correct that the simple machine reduces the input force but a reduced output force will not make work easier.

answers.content_html: It reduces the input force and increases the output force.
answers.feedback_html: Correct! The simple machine reduces the force that needs to be applied to do work.

answers.content_html: It increases the input force and reduces the output force.
answers.feedback_html: Increased input force and reduced output force will cause work more difficult.

answers.content_html: It increases the input force and the output force.
answers.feedback_html: Simple machine increases the output force at the same time reduces the input force also.

stem_html: How does a simple machine make work easier?

answers.feedback_html: This is the IMA divided by 2. Recall the correct expression for IMA of a wedge.
This is just the thickness. IMA also depends on the length of the wedge.
IMA of a wedge is the ratio of length by thickness.
This is length minus thickness. Recall the correct expression for IMA.

stem_html: What is the IMA of a wedge that is 12\,\text{cm} long and 3\,\text{cm} thick?
